subject: Football
Religion and Belief
lead_paragraph: Why do athletes only thank God when something good happens on the field? If Tim Tebow thanked Jesus after throwing an interception, it would be more of a teachable moment, says William C. Rhoden.
snippet: Why do athletes only thank God when something good happens on the field? If Tim Tebow thanked Jesus after throwing an interception, it would be more of a teachable moment, says William C. Rhoden.
